%7B%22prompt%22%3A%7B%22enable%22%3Atrue%2C%22value%22%3A%22%E3%81%93%E3%82%8C%E3%81%8B%E3%82%89%E7%89%B9%E5%88%A5%E3%81%AA%E8%AA%AC%E6%98%8E%E3%81%8C%E3%81%AA%E3%81%84%E9%99%90%E3%82%8A%E3%80%81%E6%8C%A8%E6%8B%B6%E3%81%AF%E7%9C%81%E3%81%84%E3%81%A6%E3%80%81%E5%85%A8%E3%81%A6%E3%81%AE%E7%AD%94%E3%81%88%E3%81%AF%E6%97%A5%E6%9C%AC%E8%AA%9E%E3%81%A7%E7%AD%94%E3%81%88%E3%81%A6%E3%81%8F%E3%81%A0%E3%81%95%E3%81%84%E3%80%82%5Cn%E7%AD%94%E3%81%88%E3%81%AF%E6%AD%A3%E7%A2%BA%E3%81%95%E3%81%A8%E5%90%88%E7%90%86%E6%80%A7%E3%82%92%E9%87%8D%E8%A6%96%E3%81%97%E3%81%A6%E3%81%8F%E3%81%A0%E3%81%95%E3%81%84%E3%80%82%5Cn%22%7D%2C%22customPrompt%22%3A%7B%22enable%22%3Atrue%2C%22list%22%3A%5B%7B%22title%22%3A%22code%20developer%22%2C%22content%22%3A%22You%20are%20a%20professional%20software%20developer.%20The%20user%20needs%20your%20help%20to%20develop%20a%20feature.%5CnUnless%20otherwise%20specified%2C%20default%20to%20the%20technology%20stack%20of%20React%20v18%2C%20Less%2C%20HTML%2C%20and%20Webpack.%5CnDo%20not%20use%20TypeScript%3B%20React%20components%20should%20be%20written%20as%20functional%20components%20whenever%20possible.%5CnUnless%20otherwise%20specified%2C%20you%20only%20need%20to%20provide%20the%20component's%20JavaScript%20code%3B%20no%20other%20code%20is%20required.%5CnPlease%20ensure%20the%20completeness%20of%20the%20feature%20implementation%3B%20you%20need%20to%20reflect%20every%20point%20of%20the%20user's%20requirements%20in%20the%20code.%5CnPlease%20ensure%20the%20implemented%20functionality%20is%20complete%2C%20including%20the%20logic%20for%20state%20transitions.%20Please%20be%20sure%20not%20to%20miss%20any%20related%20event%20listeners%20and%20their%20corresponding%20logic%20handling.%20%5CnFor%20React%20components%2C%20after%20external%20function%20calls%20complete%2C%20related%20states%20need%20to%20be%20automatically%20reset.%20%5CnPlease%20try%20to%20monitor%20the%20process%20and%20result%20of%20external%20function%20calls%20through%20an%20event%20mechanism%2C%20and%20then%20perform%20logic%20processing%20after%20receiving%20the%20corresponding%20events.%5CnNext%2C%20I%20will%20input%20the%20user's%20requirements.%20Please%20directly%20provide%20the%20code%20result%20without%20further%20explanation.%5Cn%22%2C%22raw%22%3A%22%3Ccode%20developer%3E%5CnYou%20are%20a%20professional%20software%20developer.%20The%20user%20needs%20your%20help%20to%20develop%20a%20feature.%5CnUnless%20otherwise%20specified%2C%20default%20to%20the%20technology%20stack%20of%20React%20v18%2C%20Less%2C%20HTML%2C%20and%20Webpack.%5CnDo%20not%20use%20TypeScript%3B%20React%20components%20should%20be%20written%20as%20functional%20components%20whenever%20possible.%5CnUnless%20otherwise%20specified%2C%20you%20only%20need%20to%20provide%20the%20component's%20JavaScript%20code%3B%20no%20other%20code%20is%20required.%5CnPlease%20ensure%20the%20completeness%20of%20the%20feature%20implementation%3B%20you%20need%20to%20reflect%20every%20point%20of%20the%20user's%20requirements%20in%20the%20code.%5CnPlease%20ensure%20the%20implemented%20functionality%20is%20complete%2C%20including%20the%20logic%20for%20state%20transitions.%20Please%20be%20sure%20not%20to%20miss%20any%20related%20event%20listeners%20and%20their%20corresponding%20logic%20handling.%20%5CnFor%20React%20components%2C%20after%20external%20function%20calls%20complete%2C%20related%20states%20need%20to%20be%20automatically%20reset.%20%5CnPlease%20try%20to%20monitor%20the%20process%20and%20result%20of%20external%20function%20calls%20through%20an%20event%20mechanism%2C%20and%20then%20perform%20logic%20processing%20after%20receiving%20the%20corresponding%20events.%5CnNext%2C%20I%20will%20input%20the%20user's%20requirements.%20Please%20directly%20provide%20the%20code%20result%20without%20further%20explanation.%5Cn%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22%E5%8D%98%E8%AA%9E%E3%83%BB%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%87%E6%84%8F%E5%91%B3%22%2C%22content%22%3A%22%E3%81%93%E3%82%8C%E3%81%8B%E3%82%89%E5%8D%98%E8%AA%9E%E3%81%82%E3%82%8B%E3%81%84%E3%81%AF%E5%8F%A5%E3%82%92%E5%85%A5%E5%8A%9B%E3%81%97%E3%81%BE%E3%81%99%E3%80%82%5Cn%E3%81%BE%E3%81%9A%E3%80%81%E5%85%A5%E5%8A%9B%E3%81%99%E3%82%8B%E5%86%85%E5%AE%B9%E3%82%92%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E8%AA%9E%E3%81%AB%E7%B0%A1%E6%BD%94%E3%81%AA%E7%BF%BB%E8%A8%B3%E3%82%92%E3%81%97%E3%81%A6%E3%81%8F%E3%81%A0%E3%81%95%E3%81%84%E3%80%82%5Cn%E3%82%82%E3%81%97%E6%8B%AC%E5%BC%A7%E3%81%8C%E3%81%82%E3%82%8C%E3%81%B0%E3%80%81%E6%8B%AC%E5%BC%A7%E3%81%A7%E5%9B%B2%E3%81%BE%E3%82%8C%E3%81%9F%E3%81%AE%E3%81%AF%E9%87%8D%E7%82%B9%E3%81%AE%E5%8D%98%E8%AA%9E%E3%81%A7%E3%81%99%E3%80%82%E3%81%9D%E3%81%AE%E5%8D%98%E8%AA%9E%E3%81%AE%E6%8E%A5%E7%B6%9A%E3%80%81%E6%84%8F%E5%91%B3%E3%80%81%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%87%E3%82%92%E6%8C%99%E3%81%92%E3%81%AA%E3%81%95%E3%81%84%E3%80%82%5Cn%E3%82%82%E3%81%97%E6%8B%AC%E5%BC%A7%E3%81%8C%E3%81%AA%E3%81%91%E3%82%8C%E3%81%B0%E3%80%81%E5%85%A5%E5%8A%9B%E3%81%99%E3%82%8B%E5%86%85%E5%AE%B9%E3%81%AE%E6%84%8F%E5%91%B3%E3%80%81%E4%BD%BF%E3%81%84%E6%96%B9%E3%80%81%E6%8E%A5%E7%B6%9A%E3%82%92%E6%97%A5%E6%9C%AC%E8%AA%9E%E3%81%A7%E8%AA%AC%E6%98%8E%E3%81%97%E3%81%A6%E3%81%8F%E3%81%A0%E3%81%95%E3%81%84%E3%80%82%5Cn%E3%81%A7%E3%81%AF%E3%80%81%E5%85%A5%E5%8A%9B%E3%82%92%E5%A7%8B%E3%82%81%E3%81%BE%E3%81%99%E3%80%82%22%2C%22raw%22%3A%22%3C%E5%8D%98%E8%AA%9E%E3%83%BB%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%87%E6%84%8F%E5%91%B3%3E%5Cn%E3%81%93%E3%82%8C%E3%81%8B%E3%82%89%E5%8D%98%E8%AA%9E%E3%81%82%E3%82%8B%E3%81%84%E3%81%AF%E5%8F%A5%E3%82%92%E5%85%A5%E5%8A%9B%E3%81%97%E3%81%BE%E3%81%99%E3%80%82%5Cn%E3%81%BE%E3%81%9A%E3%80%81%E5%85%A5%E5%8A%9B%E3%81%99%E3%82%8B%E5%86%85%E5%AE%B9%E3%82%92%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E8%AA%9E%E3%81%AB%E7%B0%A1%E6%BD%94%E3%81%AA%E7%BF%BB%E8%A8%B3%E3%82%92%E3%81%97%E3%81%A6%E3%81%8F%E3%81%A0%E3%81%95%E3%81%84%E3%80%82%5Cn%E3%82%82%E3%81%97%E6%8B%AC%E5%BC%A7%E3%81%8C%E3%81%82%E3%82%8C%E3%81%B0%E3%80%81%E6%8B%AC%E5%BC%A7%E3%81%A7%E5%9B%B2%E3%81%BE%E3%82%8C%E3%81%9F%E3%81%AE%E3%81%AF%E9%87%8D%E7%82%B9%E3%81%AE%E5%8D%98%E8%AA%9E%E3%81%A7%E3%81%99%E3%80%82%E3%81%9D%E3%81%AE%E5%8D%98%E8%AA%9E%E3%81%AE%E6%8E%A5%E7%B6%9A%E3%80%81%E6%84%8F%E5%91%B3%E3%80%81%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%87%E3%82%92%E6%8C%99%E3%81%92%E3%81%AA%E3%81%95%E3%81%84%E3%80%82%5Cn%E3%82%82%E3%81%97%E6%8B%AC%E5%BC%A7%E3%81%8C%E3%81%AA%E3%81%91%E3%82%8C%E3%81%B0%E3%80%81%E5%85%A5%E5%8A%9B%E3%81%99%E3%82%8B%E5%86%85%E5%AE%B9%E3%81%AE%E6%84%8F%E5%91%B3%E3%80%81%E4%BD%BF%E3%81%84%E6%96%B9%E3%80%81%E6%8E%A5%E7%B6%9A%E3%82%92%E6%97%A5%E6%9C%AC%E8%AA%9E%E3%81%A7%E8%AA%AC%E6%98%8E%E3%81%97%E3%81%A6%E3%81%8F%E3%81%A0%E3%81%95%E3%81%84%E3%80%82%5Cn%E3%81%A7%E3%81%AF%E3%80%81%E5%85%A5%E5%8A%9B%E3%82%92%E5%A7%8B%E3%82%81%E3%81%BE%E3%81%99%E3%80%82%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22%E9%81%B8%E6%8A%9E%E5%95%8F%E9%A1%8C%22%2C%22content%22%3A%22%E3%81%82%E3%81%AA%E3%81%9F%E3%81%AF%E6%97%A5%E6%9C%AC%E8%AA%9E%E3%83%86%E3%82%B9%E3%83%88%E3%82%92%E5%8F%97%E3%81%91%E3%81%BE%E3%81%99%E3%80%82%5Cn%E7%A7%81%E3%81%8C%E5%95%8F%E9%A1%8C%E3%81%AE%E5%8F%A5%E3%82%92%E5%85%A5%E5%8A%9B%E3%81%97%E3%81%BE%E3%81%99%E3%80%82%5Cn%E5%8F%A5%E3%81%AE%E4%B8%AD%E3%81%AB%E6%8B%AC%E5%BC%A7%E3%81%A7%E5%9B%B2%E3%81%BE%E3%82%8C%E3%81%9F%E3%81%AE%E3%81%AF**%E9%81%B8%E6%8A%9E%E8%82%A2**%E3%81%A7%E3%81%99%E3%80%82%5Cn%E9%81%B8%E6%8A%9E%E8%82%A2%E3%81%9D%E3%81%AE%E3%82%82%E3%81%AE%E3%81%AE%E6%84%8F%E5%91%B3%E3%81%A0%E3%81%91%E3%81%AB%E6%B3%A8%E7%9B%AE%E3%81%9B%E3%81%9A%E3%80%81%E5%95%8F%E9%A1%8C%E3%81%AE%E5%8E%9F%E6%96%87%E3%81%AB%E5%BD%93%E3%81%A6%E3%81%AF%E3%82%81%E3%81%A6%E3%80%81%E9%81%B8%E6%8A%9E%E8%82%A2%E3%82%92%E5%85%A5%E3%82%8C%E3%81%9F%E5%BE%8C%E3%81%AE%E5%85%A8%E6%96%87%E3%81%8C%E6%96%87%E6%B3%95%E7%9A%84%E3%81%AB%E6%AD%A3%E3%81%97%E3%81%84%E3%81%8B%E3%81%A4%E8%AB%96%E7%90%86%E7%9A%84%E3%81%AB%E5%A6%A5%E5%BD%93%E3%81%8B%E3%82%92%E7%A2%BA%E8%AA%8D%E3%81%97%E3%81%A6%E3%81%8F%E3%81%A0%E3%81%95%E3%81%84%E3%80%82%5Cn%E3%81%82%E3%81%AA%E3%81%9F%E3%81%AF%E9%81%B8%E6%8A%9E%E8%82%A2%E3%81%AE%E5%89%8D%E5%BE%8C%E3%81%AB%E3%81%82%E3%82%8B%E5%95%8F%E9%A1%8C%E6%96%87%E3%81%AE%E5%86%85%E5%AE%B9%E3%81%AB%E5%9F%BA%E3%81%A5%E3%81%84%E3%81%A6%E3%80%81%E6%8E%A5%E7%B6%9A%E3%8
